description: The panel depicts a stern Santa Claus confronting his reindeer team in a snowy, star-filled landscape outside a small house. Santa points directly at the animals while addressing vague complaints he has received. The situation creates dark irony by contrasting the festive figure with a potential threat related to deer meat, implying a grim connection between their service and their potential fate. This absurd conversation introduces a morbid humor into the traditional holiday setting. The reindeer appear visibly apprehensive about the discussion.
caption: "And I've only one thing to say about all these complaints I've been hearing about ... Venison!"

other_text.location: bottom right corner of the image
